com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.utils

Class ItemUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.utils.ItemUtil

  • public class ItemUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains item stack, item and inventory utilities

      • canTransferAll

        public static boolean canTransferAll(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack[] from,
                     org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory to)
        Tests if the given ItemStacks can be fully transferred to another array of ItemStacks
        Parameters:
        from - ItemStack source array
        to - destination Inventory
        Returns:
        True if full transfer was possible, False if not

      • transfer

        public static int transfer(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory from,
           org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory to,
           ItemParser parser,
           int maxAmount)
        Transfers all ItemStacks from one Inventory to another
        Parameters:
        from - The Inventory to take ItemStacks from
        to - The Inventory to transfer to
        maxAmount - The maximum amount of items to transfer, -1 for infinite
        parser - The item parser used to set what items to transfer. Can be null.
        Returns:
        The amount of items that got transferred

      • transfer

        public static int transfer(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack from,
           org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory to,
           int maxAmount)
        Transfers the given ItemStack to multiple slots in the Inventory
        Parameters:
        from - The ItemStack to transfer
        to - The Inventory to transfer to
        maxAmount - The maximum amount of the item to transfer, -1 for infinite
        Returns:
        The amount of the item that got transferred

      • transfer

        public static int transfer(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory from,
           org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack to,
           ItemParser parser,
           int maxAmount)
        Tries to transfer items from the Inventory to the ItemStack
        Parameters:
        from - The Inventory to take an ItemStack from
        to - The ItemStack to merge the item taken
        parser - The item parser used to set what item to transfer if the receiving item is empty. Can be null.
        maxAmount - The maximum amount of the item to transfer, -1 for infinite
        Returns:
        The amount of the item that got transferred

      • transfer

        public static int transfer(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack from,
           org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack to,
           int maxAmount)
        Merges two ItemStacks together
        - If from is empty or null, no transfer happens
        - If to is null, no transfer happens
        - If to is empty, full transfer occurs
        Parameters:
        from - The ItemStack to merge
        to - The receiving ItemStack
        maxAmount - The maximum amount of the item to transfer, -1 for infinite
        Returns:
        The amount of the item that got transferred

      • transferInfo

        public static void transferInfo(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack from,
                org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack to)
        Transfers the item type, data and enchantments from one item stack to the other
        Parameters:
        from - which Item Stack to read the info
        to - which Item Stack to transfer the info to

        Parameters:
        inventory - to remove items from
        itemid - of the items to remove
        data - of the items to remove, -1 for any data
        amount - of items to remove, -1 for infinite amount

      • findItem

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack findItem(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory,
                                      int typeId,
                                      int data)
        Obtains an item of the given type and data in the inventory specified
        If multiple items with the same type and data exist, their amounts are added together
        Parameters:
        inventory - to look in
        typeId - of the items to look for, -1 for any item
        data - of the items to look for, -1 for any data
        Returns:
        Amount of items in the inventory

        Parameters:
        inventory - to look in
        typeid - of the items to look for, -1 for any item
        data - of the items to look for, -1 for any data
        Returns:
        Amount of items in the inventory

        tag - to set to
